title: Moncton affordable housing group undeterred by lack of provincial backing in budget
description: A group seeking to build more affordable housing in Moncton says it is undeterred that the $6 million it is seeking from the provincial government wasn't included in the New Brunswick budget released Tuesday.
content: A group seeking to build more affordable housing in Moncton says it is undeterred that the million it is seeking from the provincial government wasn t included in the New Brunswick budget released Tuesday The new group was launched to serve as a housing chars
